name: Bacon-Wrapped Jalapeno Popper-Stuffed Chicken Breasts
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Jalapeno popper dip is hidden inside chicken breasts then wrapped in bacon and baked to crispy deliciousness.
ingredients: 2  fresh jalapeno peppers, seeded and minced
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Combine cream cheese, Cheddar cheese, jalapenos, garlic powder, and barbecue seasoning in a bowl
Cut a deep pocket into each chicken breast, being careful not to cut all the way through to the other side
Fill the pocket of each chicken breast with cream cheese mixture
Wrap each chicken breast with 3 slices of bacon
Place a baking rack on top of a baking sheet and place stuffed chicken on top of the rack
Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 40 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
Remove from oven and let rest for 5 minutes before serving
